DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate liraglutide change AUC ( area curve ) ethinylestradiol levonorgestrel administer combination contraceptive drug ( Neovletta® ) .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Effect Oral Contraceptive Drug After Administration Liraglutide Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.030.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Good general health judge investigator , base medical history , physical examination include 12lead ECG ( electrocardiogram ) , vital sign , blood urinary laboratory assessment History clinically significant renal , hepatic , cardiovascular , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , metabolic , endocrine , haematological , neurological , psychiatric disease major disorder may interfere objective trial , judge investigator Impaired renal function Active hepatitis B and/or active hepatitis C Positive HIV ( human immunodeficiency virus ) antibodies Known suspect allergy trial product relate product Pregnant positive pregnancy test screen nursing mother Use prescription nonprescription medication within 2 week prior first dose trial product Investigators opinion interfere pharmacokinetics compound Neovletta® Use hormone replacement therapy within 4 week prior start dose trial product History alcoholism drug abuse Smoking 10 cigarette per day , equivalent tobacco product Habitual excessive consumption methylxanthinecontaining beverage food ( coffee , tea , soft drink cola , chocolate ) judge Investigator Excessive consumption diet deviate normal diet judge Investigator
